name: 2.9 "Our Very First Christmas Show" Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In which year did the episode air?
questions.explanation:
1988.

	It aired on December 16th, 1988 as a Christmas special.

questions.text: Stephanie and DJ sit in First Class on the airplane.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Stephanie sits by the window, DJ in the middle and Joey in the aisle seat, with Michelle on his lap. Another man (Lionel) comes by and tells D.J that he was assigned to her seat, and that he had booked his ticket three months ago. This let D.J and Stephanie sit in first class, where there were some empty seats.  Jesse, Danny, Michelle and Jessie's mother sit in the row behind Joey.

questions.text: Which animal did Becky say she'd miss?
questions.explanation:
a cow.

	When Stephanie finds out that Joey was acting as Santa, she gets angry at him, thinking it was a mean trick. Becky says she misses her family and cow.

questions.text: What is Stephanie getting for Christmas?
questions.explanation:
roller skates.

	DJ finds out that Stephanie will be getting roller skates.  However, the airline loses the bag with the Christmas presents.

questions.text: Which state are the Tanners visiting?
questions.explanation:
Colorado.

	Becky was due to go to Nebraska, but had to stop to switch flights at Denver. There was a blizzard in Colorado so they had to stop at the airport there.

Sorrell Brooke.

	Sorrell Brooke also played the morally ambiguous Boss Hogg on the CBS series "The Dukes of Hazzard". He passed away in 1994 at the age of only 64.

questions.text: What's the name of Jesse's father?
questions.explanation:
Nick.

	He was trying to encourage Becky and Jesse to kiss under the mistletoe, which they do in the end.

questions.text: Why didn't Stephanie want to go on the trip?
questions.correct: she was afraid Santa wouldn't find her
options: she wanted to go to New York instead
she wanted to stay in San Francisco for Christmas
questions.explanation:
she was afraid Santa wouldn't find her.

	At the beginning of the episode, Stephanie told Danny she wouldn't go to Colorado because Santa couldn't find her there. She then drew a map for Santa.

questions.text: What was the name of Jesse's mom?
questions.explanation:
Irene.

	Jesse's parents were played by Yvonne Wilder and John Aprea.

questions.text: What was the name of Becky's cow?
questions.explanation:
Janice.

	Becky tells Jesse her cow's name is Janice.
